tvs.caption: Email address recipient
tvs.name: fb_email_to
tvs.description: Submitted forms will be sent to this address. If this field is empty, the form will be sent to the default email address of the website (which can be found under Extras > Configuration).

tvs.caption: Email FROM address
tvs.name: fb_email_from
tvs.description: Optional. Defaults to emailsender system setting.

tvs.caption: Email FROM name
tvs.name: fb_email_from_name
tvs.description: Optional. Defaults to site_name system setting.

tvs.caption: Redirect page
tvs.name: fb_redirect_id
tvs.description: Enter the ID of the page, or drag the page from the menu tree to this input field.

tvs.caption: Layout type
tvs.name: fb_form_layout
tvs.description: Vertical means the labels are always above the input fields, Horizontal means the labels are next to the fields, Inline means everything is on 1 row (so only for very small forms).

tvs.caption: Custom pre-hook(s)
tvs.name: fb_prehooks
tvs.description: A snippet name (or comma separated list of snippet names), containing the hook(s). These hooks are executed before the form is initialised.

tvs.caption: Custom hook(s)
tvs.name: fb_hooks
tvs.description: A snippet name (or comma separated list of snippet names), containing the hook(s). These hooks are executed after the form is submitted, but before any emails are sent.

tvs.caption: Dynamic recipient address
tvs.name: fb_email_to_dynamic
tvs.description: You can place any snippet / FastField call here that outputs a single email address. Retrieve something inside a resource by using the [[+current_id]] value. WARNING: populating this field will override the default recipient address, so test thoroughly!

tvs.caption: Dynamic redirect page
tvs.name: fb_redirect_dynamic
tvs.description: This works the same way as the dynamic recipient address field: enter any formula that is able to decide where to redirect the user after form submission. If left empty, it falls back on the ID provided under general settings.

tvs.caption: Email template
tvs.name: fb_email_template
tvs.description: Optional. Name of the chunk containing your own customized (HTML) email template. Make sure there is a [[+content]] placeholder in there for listing the fields.

tvs.caption: Email template rows
tvs.name: fb_email_template_rows
tvs.description: Optional. Name of the chunk containing the customized HTML for the template rows. This will be used to display each individual field in your email. Use [[+label]] and [[+value]] placeholders to show the content.
